items.sentence: She asked him to stay, but he had to go to work.
She bought a shirt for him to wear to the party.
She brought him to our place to meet my parents.
I can\'t believe I\'m talking to you about this.
I can\'t buy it because I don\'t have any money.
That can\'t be Mary. She\'s in the hospital now.
I don\'t think Tom understands what\'s going on.
I often use SSH to access my computers remotely.
I promised to help my brother with his homework.
I purchased a telescope and a book on astronomy.
I saw a man yesterday eating from a garbage can.
I\'m sorry to disturb you while you\'re talking.
I\'m sorry, but I don\'t speak French very well.
I\'m sure my parents won\'t let me go by myself.
Who do you think is most likely to win the race?
Why are conventional language classes so boring?
Why are there so many mistakes in this document?
I\'m sure that guy must get picked on at school.
I\'m thinking of visiting you one of these days.
I\'ve been very busy since the new term started.
